The sun shines brightly
Children play in the park
Cats sleep on the rug
Mom cooks a delicious meal
A boy paints a picture
The teacher teaches math
White clouds float by
A gray mouse searches
The doctor sees patients
A dog runs and plays
Happy kids play football
A girl reads a book
Golden leaves fall
There was a storm
A big ship sails
A young man learns
A bunny hops
A forest path leads
Spring flowers bloom
Friends gather for a party
